long_description: This easy-to-use, fully updated North Cascades guide is written just for people who want to spend their days in the mountains and their nights back at home. Author: Mike McQuaide. Softcover; 215 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Sasquatch Books; copyright 2008. Classic day routes selected specifically for day hiking and located throughout the North Cascades in Washington state; organized by major highways. Each hike is rated on a scenery scale of 1 to 5 and includes difficulty ratings and detailed route descriptions. Includes pass information, recommended USGS maps, altitude gain and loss and management contacts. Quick-reference chart displays best season, overall rating, and whether the hike is recommended for kids and dogs. Easy-to-use topographic maps and small, inset elevation profiles.
short_description: This easy-to-use, fully updated North Cascades guide is written just for people who want to spend their days in the mountains and their nights back at home.
